name: Square game (jstN0body)
description:
Play as a square without weaponry in a world of rich privileged squares then do what you've always wanted to do and overthrow the other squares and build your empire from the blood of their deaths so that they will all one day kneel before you as you take over the square world and then the square solar system and then the square galaxy and finally the square universe

Many things could be said about this project. Namely, that it is complete ridiculous, but that is besides the point. This is a fun little project that I have been working on (and still am) for a couple weeks and I hope you enjoy it!
